entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
